name: Detective Morton: Crying Fruit Hill
description:
In the vast territory of Rounayn, all over East Cetra, many old counties and villages still thrive within their little communities. In Yasaiita, one of these many counties, it's almost always very quiet and calm, but one night the Chief's daughter disappear in her own room, with an absurd amount of magic over the site. Detective Charles Morton rushes to the Chief's house, and with the help of his partner, Detective Sam "Crow" Maura, he will try to figure out with happened by interrogating the three women found in the house: The Chief, the Advisor and the Witch. What could have happened to Camille?

Early development/ Concept Art:
